task: Find a recipe for banana bread with more than 200 reviews and a rating of at least 4.0 stars on Allrecipes.
Find a recipe for banana bread with more than 200 reviews and a rating of at least 4.0 stars on Allrecipes.
user_action_and_explanation: type "banana bread" into the search bar with the placeholder text 'Find a recipe or ingredient' to locate banana bread recipes with reviews and ratings.
observation: The search for banana bread on Allrecipes successfully returned several options meeting the criteria. Notably, 'Banana Banana Bread' has 16,789 ratings, 'Janet's Rich Banana Bread' has 10,582 ratings, and 'Joy's Easy Banana Bread' has 3,035 ratings, all with a rating of over 4 stars. Each of these recipes satisfies the requirement of more than 200 reviews and a rating of at least 4.0 stars.
